    Child Care Access Map

    child_care_access_map.Rmd
    library(minnccaccess)

    How to create a map yourself?

    
create_access(method = "hexagon") %>%
  map_access(n_color = 10, dots = FALSE)

    Options

    Create access data (create_access())

    method
    geography
    geo_year
    acs_year
    hex_side
    radius
    decay
    as_of

    Map access (map_access())

    n_color
    kid_per_dot
    dots
    fill

    How is access measured?

    Davis, E. E., Lee, W. F., & Sojourner, A. (2019). Family-centered measures of access to early care and education. Early Childhood Research Quarterly, 47, 472-486.
